subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Fifth-seeded Butler lost a 9-point lead in the first half and an 8-point lead in the second, but held off 13th-seeded Murray State to advance to the West Region semifinals.
snippet: Fifth-seeded Butler lost a 9-point lead in the first half and an 8-point lead in the second, but held off 13th-seeded Murray State to advance to the West Region semifinals.
